titleStmt.title: Divers crabtree lectures Expressing the severall languages that shrews read to their husbands, either at morning, noone, or night. With a pleasant relation of a shrewes Munday, and shrewes Tuesday, and why they were so called. Also a lecture betweene a pedler and his wife in the canting language. With a new tricke to tame a shrew.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I. Okes, for Iohn Sweeting, and are to be sold at his shop in Cornehill, neare Popes-head Ally at the signe of the Crowne,
